description.narrative: The proposed IFC investment comprises of a loan of up to US$25 million to support infrastructure for 30 additional sewing lines located within the current footprint at the Al-Hassan Industrial Estate, which will house the additional lines. (the Project).

The proposed IFC investment is expected to provide the following additionality to the Company, which relates to both non-financial and financial aspects, and are valuable to the Company: IFC provides financing with a tenor and grace period that are longer than what is typically available in Jordan. The longer tenor is critical as the Company needs to mitigate the financial and operational risks associated with the Project. The Company will also work with IFC to improve its E&S and Corporate Governance standards. In addition, IFC's advisory engagement will support the Company's workforce and other companies in the industrial zone.
